serviceRadius: We serve Denver and surrounding Front Range communities within 25 miles

areas.name: Denver
areas.description: Bright Spark Electric serves homeowners and businesses across Denver, from Capitol Hill Victorian renovations to new construction in RiNo. Our licensed electricians know Denver's diverse housing stock and the electrical challenges that come with it.
serviceHighlights: EV charger installation — Level 2 home charging stations
Panel upgrades to 200A for older Denver homes

areas.name: Aurora
areas.description: Aurora is one of Colorado's largest cities and home to a diverse mix of older bungalows, mid-century ranch homes, and newer developments. Bright Spark Electric provides dependable electrical service across all of Aurora.
serviceHighlights: Federal Pacific and Zinsco panel replacement
Storm damage repair and outdoor service entrance restoration
Whole-home rewire for mid-century ranch homes

areas.name: Lakewood
areas.description: Lakewood's mix of 1960s ranch homes, newer townhomes, and Belmar-area condos keeps Bright Spark Electric busy year-round. We understand the electrical systems common to Jefferson County and bring honest, licensed work to every job.
serviceHighlights: Panel upgrades from 100A to 200A or 400A service
Grounding and GFCI/AFCI outlet upgrades throughout the home
Outdoor lighting and weatherproof outlet installation

areas.name: Arvada
areas.description: From Olde Town Arvada's historic homes to newer subdivisions near Candelas, Bright Spark Electric brings licensed electrical expertise to every corner of the city. Arvada homeowners trust us for straightforward pricing and work done right the first time.
serviceHighlights: Historic home rewire with minimal drywall disruption
Solar-ready panel upgrades and battery backup installation
Service entrance and weatherhead replacement after storm damage

areas.name: Centennial
areas.description: Centennial is one of Colorado's newest cities, but its housing stock spans several decades. Bright Spark Electric serves Centennial homeowners with the electrical expertise their homes deserve — from 1980s subdivisions to custom builds near Cherry Creek State Park.
serviceHighlights: Aluminum wiring remediation and CO/ALR outlet upgrades
EV charger installation in attached and detached garages
Basement finishing electrical — circuits, recessed lighting, home theater

areas.name: Boulder
areas.description: Boulder's progressive community leads the state in solar adoption, EV ownership, and energy-efficient home upgrades. Bright Spark Electric brings the licensed electrical expertise to match Boulder's forward-thinking approach to energy.
serviceHighlights: Solar-ready panel upgrades and Xcel interconnect compliance
Whole-home rewire for historic Boulder bungalows
EV charger installation — Tesla, ChargePoint, and universal J1772
